definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: I am just reading La dame aux camellias.
Marguerite had never been seen with any flowers but camellias.
sentences.chinese: 除了茶花以外，从来没有人看见过她还带过别的花。

sentences.english: Oh, she was the Lady Camelli in China.
Tap water around here is very hard and camellias don't like it.
sentences.chinese: 这周边的自来水很硬，山茶花并不喜欢。

sentences.english: He likes to smoke the cigarette of the camellia brand.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢吸山茶花牌香烟。

sentences.english: You say that these are popular products Camellia ?
sentences.chinese: 你说我这些茶花都是俗品？

sentences.english: When this camellia is a different colour.
sentences.chinese: 当这朵茶花变颜色的时候。

sentences.english: Chahua never teases with her words – she simply amuses you.
sentences.chinese: 茶花的文字从不刻意调侃，却看了时常让人忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: Camellia japonica through radiation treatment strengthencold- resistance.
sentences.chinese: 辐射处理的山茶花抗寒性增强。

sentences.english: Above all, it's a smart anti-Pygmalion.
sentences.chinese: 总之，它是一个聪明的反茶花女的电影。

sentences.english: It is refined from camellia tree seeds.
sentences.chinese: 这是成品，从山茶花树的种子。

sentences.english: She was at the table by the window, examining the camellia.
sentences.chinese: 她在窗前的桌子旁审视着山茶花。

sentences.english: That's when the azaleas and camellias bloom.
sentences.chinese: 那是杜鹃花和山茶花开放的时候。

sentences.english: I have never seen a big camellia .
sentences.chinese: 我从未看到过大棵的茶花。

definition: narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
